The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 January is 2,789,983 (4,956.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 January, there were 368,643 new confirmed cases (654.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 January, there were 329,035 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 12% (39,608 extra cases).
